\usepackage{geometry}
\usepackage{xparse}
\usepackage{xcolor}
\usepackage{mdframed}

\geometry{
a4paper,
left=0.42in,
right=0.2in,
top=0.2in,
bottom=0.2in,
headheight=0.0in
}

\definecolor{watermelon}{HTML}{B4Da55}
\definecolor{candy}{HTML}{f42069}

\mdfdefinestyle{debugstyle}{
  frametitlebackgroundcolor = watermelon,
  linecolor = candy,
  linewidth = 2pt
}

\NewDocumentCommand \esboxTitleString{ m o }{
  % FIXME: load in images
  #1%
  \IfValueT{#2}{\hfill \textbf{#2}}
}

\NewDocumentEnvironment{esbox}{ O{\textwidth} m o }
{% begin code
  \begin{minipage}[t]{#1}%
  \begin{mdframed}[style=debugstyle, frametitle={\esboxTitleString{#2}[#3]}]%
}
{ % enddef
  \end{mdframed}%
  \end{minipage}%
}%
